text:
Facebook | iOS Engineers | ONSITE Menlo Park/San Francisco (Instagram) (Relocation package provided) Facebook is looking for iOS Engineers to come join our mobile efforts! We're hiring across all teams including: the Facebook app, Messenger, Instagram, Accessibility, etc.

We're looking for engineers who have at least 2 years of experience in iOS development. Doesn't matter if you're more of an Objective-C or Swift developer, we have calibrated interviewers that give you the freedom to interview in either language.

If you're curious what life is like at Facebook, feel free to take a look at our links below:

Inside Mobile Engineering: https://www.facebook.com/careers/life/mobile-en/

Inside iOS Engineering: https://code.facebook.com/ios

If you're interested, shoot me an email at ranadu (at) fb.com with the subject line Hacker News.

Agencies and solicitors will be blacklisted.
